### Investigator Notes
- No new safety signals identified this week by local PI
- Study drug accountability reconciled, no discrepancies
- Multi-site pattern confirmed: ALT out of range in statin co-administered patients independent of site

### Events
- IVRS system update deployed, randomization unaffected
- Regulatory submission packet sent to Site 08

### Notes
- Week 21: Cross-site statin subgroup hepatic signal confirmed. DDI pharmacology review in progress.
